TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Curse of Agony
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Curse of Agony by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Suppression
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to hit with spells by [@value]%, and reduces the mana cost of your Affliction spells by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Corruption
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage done by your Corruption by [@value]% and increases the critical strike chance of your Seed of Corruption by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Frailty
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the amount of attack power reduced by your Curse of Weakness by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Drain Soul
TalentsTiers.Description: Returns [@value]% of your maximum mana if the target is killed by you while you drain its soul. In addition, your Affliction spells generate [@value2]% less threat.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Life Tap
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the amount of Mana awarded by your Life Tap spell by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Soul Siphon
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the amount drained by your Drain Life and Drain Soul spells by an additional [@value]% for each Affliction effect on the target, up to a maximum of [@value2]% additional effect.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Fear
TalentsTiers.Description: Causes your Fear spell to inflict a Nightmare on the target when the fear effect ends. The Nightmare effect reduces the target's movement speed by [@value]% for 5 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Fel Concentration
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks, while casting Drain Life, Drain Mana, Drain Soul, Unstable Affliction and Haunt by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Amplify Curse
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the global cooldown of your Curses by 0.5 sec. Also increases the dmage done by Curse of Agony by 10%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Grim Reach
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the range of your Affliction spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Nightfall
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives your Corruption and Drain Life spells a [@value]% chance to cause you to enter a Shadow Trance state after damaging the opponent. The Shadow Trance state reduces the casting time of your next Shadow Bolt spell by 100%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Empowered Corruption
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage of your Corruption spell by an amount equal to [@value]% of your spell power.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shadow Embrace
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Shadow Bolt and Haunt spells apply the Shadow Embrace effect, increasing all periodic affliction damage dealt to the target by you by [@value]%, and reduces all periodic healing done to the target by [@value2]%. Lasts for 12 sec. Stacks up to 3 times.

TalentsTiers.Name: Siphon Life
TalentsTiers.Description: When you deal damage with your corruption spell, you are instantly healed for 40% of the damage done. In addition, the damage done by your Corruption, Seed of Corruption and Unstable Affliction damage over time effects is increased by 5%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Curse of Exhaustion
TalentsTiers.Description:
5% of base mana
30 yd range

Instant Cast
Reduces the target's movement speed by 30% for 12 sec. Only one Curse per Warlock can be active on any one target.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Felhunter
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Felhunter regains [@value]% of its maximum mana each time it hits with its Shadow Bite ability and the cooldown on that ability is reduced by [@value2] sec. In addition, increases the effect of your Felhunter's Fel Intelligence by [@value3]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Shadow Mastery
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage dealt or life drained by your Shadow spells by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Eradication
TalentsTiers.Description: When you deal damage with Corruption you have a [@value]% chance to increase your spell casting speed by [@value2]% for 10 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Contagion
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage of Curse of Agony, Corruption and Seed of Corruption by [@value]% and reduces the chance your helpfull Affliction spells and damage over time effects will be dispelled by an additional [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Dark Pact
TalentsTiers.Description:
30 yd range
Instant
Drains 305 of your summoned demon's Mana, returning 100% to you.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Howl of Terror
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the casting time of your Howl of Terror spell by [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Malediction
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your spell damage by [@value]% and increases the periodic critical strike chance of your corruption and unstable affliction spells by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Deaths Embrace
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the amount drained by your Drain Life by [@value]% while your health is at or below [@value2]% health, and increases the damage done by your Warlock Shadow spells by [@value3]% when your target is at or below 35% health.

TalentsTiers.Name: Unstable Affliction
TalentsTiers.Description:
12% of base mana
30 yd range

1.5 sec Cast
Shadow energy slowly destroys the target, causing 660 damage over 15 sec. In addition, if the Unstable Affliction is dispelled it will cause 990 damage to the dispeller and silence them for 5 sec. Only one Unstable Affliction or Immolate per Warlock can be active on any one target.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Pandemic
TalentsTiers.Description: Grants the periodic damage from your Corruption and Unstable Affliction spells the ability to critically hit for 100% increased damage, and increase the critical strike damage bonus of your Haunt spell by 100%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Everlasting Affliction
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Corruption and Unstable Affliction spells gain an additional [@value]% of your bonus spell damage and your Drain Life, Drain Soul, Shadow Bolt and Haunt spells have a [@value2]% chance to reset the duration of your Corruption spell on the target.

TalentsTiers.Name: Haunt
TalentsTiers.Description:
10% of base mana
30 yd range

1.5 sec Cast
8 sec cooldown

You send a ghostly soul into the target, dealing 645 to 753 Shadow damage and increasing all damage done by your Warlock damage-over-time effects on the target by 20% for 12 sec. When the Haunt spell ends or is dispelled, the soul returns to you, healing you for 100% of the damage it did to the target.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks
